blogposts.title: Pakistan
blogposts.content:
Pakistan, Officially the Islamic Republic of the Pakistan, is a country in South Asia. It is the world's fifths most populous country, with a population exceeding 225.2 million, and has the world's seconds largest Muslim population.

Pakistan is the 33rd-largest country by area, spanning 881913 square kilometers.

blogposts.title: India
blogposts.content: India is a country in South Asia.
